sentence: Republican Senate candidate Herschel Walker claims he is sitting on a mist that could rid your body of the virus, reported the Washington Post.
author: Kalyn Womack
title: Republican Senate candidate Herschel Walker Claims he Found the COVID Cure

sentence: x Just in: Herschel Walker pulls out of Marjorie Greene event after she spoke at pro-Putin rally #gapol #gasen https://t.co/Vvd61tcpe4 Greg Bluestein (@bluestein) March 1, 2022 x McConnell had to slap down NRSC chair Rick Scotts plan to raise taxes; Cawthorn and the Nazi Caucus introduced a bill to not fund Ukraine until the border is secure; rising Oberfuhrer Wendy Rogers was censured, and many GOP skipping the #SOTU.
title: "We Will Save Democracy"

sentence: The Washington Post asked Save America to provide winners for a series of other contests it has held, which included meeting the president at a rally in South Carolina this weekend, meeting Trump at his palatial Florida club last year, playing golf with Trump and Georgia Senate candidate Herschel Walker in Palm Beach, or receiving commemorative memorabilia such as a football signed by Trump and Walker, a College Football Hall of Famer.
title: Trump fundraiser event promised

sentence: It was deeply unfortunate when Herschel Walker, during a church appearance last weekend, suggested that the existence of apes disproves evolutionary biology.
author: Steve Benen
title: Herschel Walker appeared to question in vitro fertilization, too
